content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 37, "index": 18}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "chiseled_nether_bricks", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 22, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft birch_planks and then a birch_button. Birch_planks requires placing 1 birch_log, birch_wood, stripped_birch_log or stripped_birch_wood anywhere in the crafting table. Therefore I will first need to move the stripped_birch_wood from slot 31 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_birch_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 37, "index": 18}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "chiseled_nether_bricks", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 22, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I can craft the birch_planks by moving them from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 37, "index": 18}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "chiseled_nether_bricks", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 22, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: I need to place the birch_planks in slot 11 into the crafting table, so I will move it to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: birch_button
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobweb", "quantity": 44, "index": 10}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 16}, {"type": "nether_star", "quantity": 37, "index": 18}, {"type": "brain_coral_block", "quantity": 41, "index": 19}, {"type": "writable_book", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 11, "index": 21}, {"type": "jungle_fence", "quantity": 26, "index": 23}, {"type": "chiseled_nether_bricks", "quantity": 16, "index": 24}, {"type": "nether_brick", "quantity": 32, "index": 27}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 45, "index": 33}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 31, "index": 34}, {"type": "brown_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 38}, {"type": "cooked_porkchop", "quantity": 22, "index": 39}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 40}, {"type": "diamond_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]

act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
